sentences.sContent: The government chartered a new bank in the capital.
sentences.sContent_eng: The government chartered a new bank in the capital.
sentences.sCn: 政府特许在首都建立一家新银行。

sentences.sContent: Generally speaking, the business stakeholders who chartered and funded the project should announce changes in the external business environment to the project team.
sentences.sContent_eng: Generally speaking, the business stakeholders who chartered and funded the project should announce changes in the external business environment to the project team.
sentences.sCn: 总体来说，那些特许的和投资的商业涉众应该向项目团队来宣布在外部商业环境中的变更。

phrases.pCn: （英国）渣打银行；（英国）渣打集团有限公司
注册会计师；会计师；特许会计师

words.tran: 特许；包租；发给特许执照

trans.tranOther: an  accountant  ,  surveyor  etc who has successfully completed special examinations
